title: Justin Bieber ‘Super Proud’ Of How Madison Beer Handled Period Stain Drama: ‘Own It’

og.description: Feb 13, 2018 - Justin Bieber is 'super proud' of his protégé Madison Beer for handling an embarrassing situation like a pro, we've EXCLUSIVELY learned. Shortly after pics of her period stain in a white bikini went viral, the Biebs told her to just 'own it!'
og.title: Justin Bieber ‘Super Proud’ Of How Madison Beer Handled Period Stain Drama: ‘Own It’ | Madison beer bikini, Madison beer, Madison
